name: CAT REKT!
description:
• Two cats with a ticking timebomb stuck to their back.
  • One button that makes one bomb explode and dismantles the other bomb.
  • No time.

You are a cat who must race against the clock! You may explode any minute, but so may your opponent. In the same building, you two are frantically searching for the button that immediately detonates the opponent's bomb and saves your life. Meanwhile, keep an eye out for all the traps lying around everywhere, because ain't nobody got time for that! Who will survive the longest?


Features
  • Cats! We have cats in our game!
  • Blow up the other cat… before he makes YOU explode!
  • Watch how your enemy walks into some sneaky traps like an idiot!
  • Next level paw-some puns!
  • Play together with a friend or a stranger via internet!
